actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Commission on Art to recommend to the Senate two outstanding individuals whose paintings shall be placed in two of the remaining unfilled spaces in the Senate reception room.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Commission on Art to select two outstanding former Senators, now deceased, whose paintings shall be placed in two of the remaining unfilled spaces in the Senate reception room, upon approval by the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Commission on Art to recommend to the Senate two outstanding individuals whose paintings shall be placed in two of the remaining unfilled spaces in the Senate reception room.
